hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Second Room Lower Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Epona's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #Farore's Wind#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Nut Capacity# and #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that leaping above the Market entrance enriches most children.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path of #Skulls#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path of #Skulls#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #3# major items.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #a Fire Temple Small Key# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #8# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of #Skulls#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Forest Trial Eye Switch Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?
